word:
HERE IS ANOTHER ONE TO BROTHER OLSEN. THIS WAS BACK THERE, REFERRING TO THE ADMINISTRATION BEFORE THIS--AWAY BACK IN 1895. BUT THIS TELLS WHAT IS TO BE DONE. WHAT I AM READING ALL THIS NOW FOR IS THAT YOU MAY SEE WHERE THE DIFFICULTY LIES, WHERE YOU ARE TO GO TO WORK TO CORRECT THINGS. 
                                                                           19
